portfolio.title: QR code component
portfolio.discription: A perfect first challenge if you're new to HTML and CSS. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's ideal if you haven't learned about building responsive layouts yet.

portfolio.title: Age calculator app
portfolio.discription: This challenge is designed to sharpen your JavaScript and form validation skills. Working with dates in JavaScript can be tricky, so this will be a nice test!

portfolio.title: Product preview card component
portfolio.discription: This HTML & CSS-only challenge will be perfect for anyone starting to build responsive projects.

portfolio.title: Testimonials grid section
portfolio.discription: This challenge will be perfect practice for anyone wanting to test their CSS Grid skills. Grid is such a powerful addition to CSS, so it's worth getting to grips with it!

portfolio.title: News homepage
portfolio.discription: This news homepage will be an excellent opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. There will be lots of tricky decisions to make and plenty of learning opportunities!

portfolio.title: Intro section with dropdown navigation
portfolio.discription: This challenge will test your ability to create dropdown navigation menus, a common pattern on larger sites. It will also provide some nice basic layout challenges.

portfolio.title: Clipboard landing page
portfolio.discription: Put your layout skills to the test with this HTML & CSS landing page challenge. This challenge includes a design for hover states.

portfolio.title: Sunnyside agency landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will be a perfect test of your layout and responsive skills. There's a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu, but the focus is HTML & CSS.

portfolio.title: Loopstudios landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge is perfect if you're looking to test your CSS Grid chops. Even without Grid, this project will be a fun one to help you practice your layout skills!

portfolio.title: Blogr landing page
portfolio.discription: Flex your layout muscles with this landing page challenge. You'll mostly be working with HTML & CSS for this project with a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu.

portfolio.title: Expenses chart component
portfolio.discription: In this challenge, you'll create a bar chart component from scratch. We provide a local JSON file, so you can add the chart data dynamically if you choose.

portfolio.title: Time tracking dashboard
portfolio.discription: A perfect opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. For anyone wanting to take it up a notch, we provide a JSON data file to practice working with data.

portfolio.title: Huddle landing page with curved sections
portfolio.discription: Practice using pseudo-elements for styling extras and the CSS position property for the sections with curved edges.

portfolio.title: Insure landing page
portfolio.discription: Test your layout skills with this HTML & CSS only landing page. This challenge is perfect if you're starting to get confident in laying out web pages.

portfolio.title: Easybank landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will provide a nice test for your layout skills. If you're ready to move up from Junior challenges, this one is a great next step.

portfolio.title: Chat app CSS illustration
portfolio.discription: In this challenge, you'll be building out the entire app illustration from scratch. This will seriously test your CSS skills. So give it a go if you feel confident!

portfolio.title: Room homepage
portfolio.discription: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.

portfolio.title: Space tourism multi-page website
portfolio.discription: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

portfolio.title: Interactive card details form
portfolio.discription: This fun project will be an excellent way to practice DOM manipulation and form validation while also putting your HTML and CSS skills to the test.

portfolio.title: Multi-step form
portfolio.discription: An excellent test for your form-building and JS skills, this project will pose many challenges along the way to completion.

portfolio.title: Todo app
portfolio.discription: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle.

portfolio.title: Manage landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will be a great test for your responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

portfolio.title: Bookmark landing page
portfolio.discription: This challenge will really test your layout skills. There are also areas that will require some JavaScript, such as the tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.

portfolio.title: E-commerce product page
portfolio.discription: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!
